name: Alison Gosling
text: Nathan & Ben recently did a garden renovation for us and we couldn’t be happier with it. They came up with the design and went over and above to deliver it, including overcoming some challenges. Would highly recommend them and wouldn’t hesitate to have them do any work!

name: Paul Salter
text: We bought a new home and needed a new pitched roof and a new flat roof. Nathan and Ben are hardworking, going above and beyond to make sure our home was safe and protected when it poured down. They resolved bigger issues with the flat roof so it now fully protects our home. We cannot thank them enough. Both roofs look amazing — the best looking in the street. Reliable, clean, and kept us fully updated with videos and photographs throughout the roof replacement. 10/10 Thank you!!

text: Great service, very friendly, wouldn't hesitate to recommend.
